AT.name: Comic Workshop 2
AT.description: 40% Preisnachlass, wenn Sie das erste Comic Workshop besitzen! </br></br> The reference for comic and manga’s creation on Nintendo 3DS™ has returned! Smoother, bigger and stronger than the previous title, Comic Workshop 2 brings you extra comfort and new functions to make even more amazing drawings! Smoother? Setup your most comfy config with the new button mapping interface. Thanks to a higher response time, drawing feels more natural! Bigger? New Gradation and Saturated Linework tools to add amazing effects to your drawings! Improved Text tool, many more Stickers and Roller Stamps in full-color, a Clipboard is available to copy/paste between pages, a grid for precise drawings, a color lock option... and much more! Stronger? New layer blending modes for amazing color mixing and a transparency lock available for backgrounds. Powerful transform settings for Copy-Cut-Paste, Stickers, Roller Stamps and Pictures! 360°rotation and an aspect ratio lock for resizing without distorting. Save your drawings in better quality, preview your pages from the menu, use colors in storyboard mode, etc.

BG.name: Comic Workshop 2
BG.description: 40% off if you own the first Comic Workshop! The reference for comic and manga’s creation on Nintendo 3DS™ has returned! Setup your most comfy config with the new button mapping interface. Thanks to a higher response time, drawing feels more natural! Bigger? New Gradation and Saturated Linework tools to add amazing effects to your drawings! Improved Text tool, many more Stickers and Roller Stamps in full-color, a Clipboard is available to copy/paste between pages, a grid for precise drawings, a color lock option... and much more! Stronger? New layer blending modes for amazing color mixing and a transparency lock available for backgrounds. Powerful transform settings for Copy-Cut-Paste, Stickers, Roller Stamps and Pictures! 360°rotation and an aspect ratio lock for resizing without distorting. Save your drawings in better quality, preview your pages from the menu, use colors in storyboard mode, etc.

BE.name: Comic Workshop 2
BE.description: 40% de réduction si vous possédez le premier Comic Workshop ! La référence pour la création de BD et manga sur Nintendo 3DS™ est de retour ! Plus fluide, plus grand et plus puissant que le précèdent opus, Comic Workshop 2 vous apporte plus de confort et de nouvelles fonctions pour faire vos BD et mangas ! Plus fluide ? Choisissez votre config grâce à l’interface de configuration des boutons. Dessiner est maintenant plus naturel grâce à un temps de réponse plus élevé ! Plus grand ? Ajoutez d’incroyables effets avec les nouveaux outils de Dégradé et de Lignes Saturées ! Un outil de Texte amélioré, plein de nouvelles Décorations et Rouleaux à Motifs en couleurs, un Presse-Papiers pour copier/coller sur une autre page, une grille pour plus de précision, un verrouillage de couleurs… et bien plus ! Plus puissant ? Nouveaux modes de superposition pour les calques permettant de faire de superbes mélanges de couleurs et un verrouillage de la transparence pour l’arrière-plan. Puissantes options de transformation, sauvegarde des dessins en meilleur qualité, aperçu des pages depuis le menu, couleurs disponible en mode storyboard, etc.

Powerful transform settings for Copy-Cut-Paste, Stickers, Roller Stamps and Pictures! 360°rotation and an aspect ratio lock for resizing without distorting. Save your drawings in better quality, preview your pages from the menu, use colors in storyboard mode, etc.

SI.name: Comic Workshop 2
SI.description: 40% off if you own the first Comic Workshop! The reference for comic and manga’s creation on Nintendo 3DS™ has returned! Smoother, bigger and stronger than the previous title, Comic Workshop 2 brings you extra comfort and new functions to make even more amazing drawings! Smoother? Setup your most comfy config with the new button mapping interface. Thanks to a higher response time, drawing feels more natural! Bigger? New Gradation and Saturated Linework tools to add amazing effects to your drawings!
